title: Cape Fear Volunteer Center is putting together some events to remember the 10th Anniversary of 9/11, how would the Wilmington Community like to honor those lost through doing small acts of service. What would they like to see us offer for individuals and families to participate in?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. Thanks for using MyReporter.com!  http://www.myreporter.com/?p=10942
